name: Icebergs (NSUAR)
description:
Ever heard of Asteroids? This game is heavily, HEAVILY inspired by it. We present: ICEBERGS! 

In Icebergs you are an armed expedition boat sent to reclaim troubled waters in the arctic. The cold seas have been claimed by none other than Penguin Pirates! Engage in naval combat against swashbuckling flightless birds while also dodging dangerous icebergs.
